Class LocationValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.vizzly.datatype.readings.Value

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimedLocationValue

    public class LocationValue
extends Value
    This class implements a data type that represents a measurements with attached location information.
    Author:
    Matthias Keller
